title: Dar Attajalli
description: Boutique hotel in the heart of Fez. The historic house features a rooftop winter garden on the terrace with its lush flora and stunning view over the medina. Emphasis is on healthy lifestyle which is reflected in the food being locally sourced, and wherever possible, organically grown. Chef specializes in Moroccan vegetarian cuisine and serves a set four-course menu to the guests; vegan upon request. Reservation is required before 11am for dinner on the same day.
